model

Class Reservation

  • Object
    • Entity
      • StatusEntity<ReservationStatus>
        • Reservation

  • public class Reservation
extends StatusEntity<ReservationStatus>
    Reservation is a StatusEntity that encapsulates information about a Reservation.
    Author:
    YingHao

      • getAssignedRoom

        public Room getAssignedRoom()
        Gets the room assigned to this reservation.
        Returns:

      • setAssignedRoom

        public void setAssignedRoom(Room room)
        Sets the room assigned to this reservation and assigns this reservation to a ReservationStatus.Confirmed status. Passing in a null paramter will not cause the assigned room to change to null, it will only remove this reservation from the reservation list of the assigned Room instance and assigns this reservation a ReservationStatus.Waitlist status.
        Parameters:
        room - - Room assigned to this reservation.

      • getPayment

        public Payment getPayment()
        Gets the payment instance that was made for this reservation.
        Returns:
        payment

      • setPayment

        public void setPayment(Payment payment)
        Sets the payment instance that was made for this reservation.
        Parameters:
        payment -

      • setStatus

        public void setStatus(ReservationStatus status)
        Sets the reservation status. Setting to Cancelled or Expired or CheckedOut will also cause this method to invoke a setAssignedRoom(Room) with a null paramter. In addition, setting to CheckedOut will invoke StatusEntity.setStatus(Enum) with a RoomStatus.Vacant parameter for the assigned Room instance.
        Overrides:
        setStatus in class StatusEntity<ReservationStatus>
        Parameters:
        status - - The status to set for this entity.

        public String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class Entity
